issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
KitchenSink crashes when I add and remove tabs in TabGroups.
h6. It's not a regression since same thing happens in 3.4.1 GA

h5. Steps To Reproduce
1. Install the KitchenSink in your device
2. Go to Base UI > Tab Groups
3. Press *Add/Remove Tab* button
4. Press *Close/Animate Tab Group* button
5. Press *Add/Remove Tab* button again

h5. Actual Result
KitchenSink crashes. Crash log is attached.

h5. Expected Result
App should not crash.

Note: It's crashing on iPhones not in iPads. That is, crash is observed when *more* tab is created in TabGroup.
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink crashes when adding and removing TabGroups
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK: 3.5.0.v20150112153317
Appc-Studio:  3.4.1 GA
Titanium CLI: 3.4.1 GA
Alloy : 1.5.1 GA
Xcode : 6.1
OS: OSX 10.10.1
Device : iPhone 5S (iOS 8.1)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
